name: 时间参数字典
description: 中文时间表达式到SQL时间条件的映射

今天.condition: created_at >= CURDATE() AND created_at < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)

昨天.condition: created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND created_at < CURDATE()

明天.condition: created_at >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY)

今日.condition: created_at >= CURDATE() AND created_at < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)

本周.condition: created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

上周.condition: created_at >= DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND created_at < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY)

下周.condition: created_at >= DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY), INTERVAL 14 DAY)

这周.condition: created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

本月.condition: created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

上月.sql: YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
上月.condition: created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01')

下月.sql: YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
下月.condition: created_at >= DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 2 MONTH)

这个月.condition: created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

今年.condition: created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01') AND created_at < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01'), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)

去年.condition: created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AND created_at < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01')

明年.condition: created_at >= DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01'), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01'), INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
